acceptance-test-run.title: Podam should handle immutable Pojos with non generic collections
acceptance-test-run.name: podamShouldHandleImmutablePojosWithNonGenericCollections

test-step.description: When I invoke the factory manufacturing for <span class='step-parameter'>class uk.co.jemos.podam.test.dto.ImmutableWithNonGenericCollectionsPojo
Then the Object <span class='step-parameter'>ImmutableWithNonGenericCollectionsPojo ( nonGenerifiedCollection = [java.lang.Object@42334d07 should not be null
Then the collection should not be null or empty
Then the collection should have exactly java.lang.Object@7d6406c8 elements
Then the Set<?> <span class='step-parameter'>[java.lang.Object@4add8b8d should contain at least one non-empty element
Then the collection should have exactly java.lang.Object@1235abb2 elements
Then the Map<?, ?> <span class='step-parameter'>{java.lang.Object@39fd1bfd=java.lang.Object@4f1179e7 should contain at least one non empty element
Then the map should have exactly java.lang.Object@1c66e404=java.lang.Object@591f5945 elements
